name: Nippy's Winter Quest
description:
Update 1.2 

  • Added controller support
  • Added a way to quickly restart the stage without the intro
  • Added a timer for people to 'speedrun' the stage.

A certain dragon broke the carousel and dropped all the gifts into the valley. Oh no! This means the Holidragons are not able to deliver all the gifts this year! It's up to you to gather all the gifts and bring them all the way up to Presents Peak. 

Nippy's Winter Quest is a tiny 3D platformer that was the result of Art Prom. A collaboration project organized by Max Grecke and the Batrat Community. We spent about 3 weeks on the project from start to finish.

Controls:

  • Move - WASD
  • Camera - Mouse
  • Roll - F (or mouse click)
  • Sprint - Left Shift
  • Jump - Space

Credits:

  • Game Development and 3D Art by Tim Remmers
  • Character design and 2D art assets by Favio 'Wooker' Valiente
  • Nippy the Dragon SFX by twitch.tv/CutiePandaChan

Music: 

  • Holiday Weasel Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
  • Jingle Bell Swing - Mark Smeby
